.content-area>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>*{margin-bottom:2rem}@media (max-width:899px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>*{margin-bottom:1rem}}.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area>:last-child,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>:last-child,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>:last-child{margin-bottom:0}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area{padding-right:2.5rem;width:calc(100% - 300px)}}.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area{width:100%}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area{width:18.75rem}}.site-content__layout--full-width (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--app{padding-left:2rem;padding-right:1rem}.site-content__layout--app *{margin-bottom:0;margin-top:0}.site-content__layout--app .article-list{padding:0}}.site-content__layout--app .site-main{background:-webkit-gradient(linear,left top,right img{height:100%;left:0;position:absolute;top:0;width:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover}.image-wrapper.portrait:not(.square-on-mobile){height:0;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:56.25%;position:relative;background-color:#ebebeb}.image-wrapper.portrait:not(.square-on-mobile)           <div class="dropnav__section dropnav__section--article-list dropnav__section--quarter">
           <div class="article-list article-list--bulleted">
            <h3 class="article-list__heading article-list__heading--hidden">
             Top Stories
            </h3>
            <div class="article-list__content">
             <article class="article-list__article">
              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context="[]">
               <h4 class="article-list__article-title">
                <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://ktla.com/news/nationworld/miami-spring-break-crowds-got-so-out-of-hand-that-authorities-called-in-swat-teams-set-earlier-curfew-police/">
                 Miami spring break crowds got so out of hand that authorities called in SWAT teams, set earlier curfew: Police
                </a>
               </h4>
              </div>
             </article>
             <article class="article-list__article">
              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context="[]">

            Search
           </title>
           <path d="M15.72 15.4l-3.75-3.8a7 7 0 0 0 1.72-4.612 6.851 6.851 0 1 0-6.85 6.98 6.713 6.713 0 0 0 3.72-1.127l3.85 3.9a.9.9 0 0 0 .65.276.92.92 0 0 0 .66-.276.965.965 0 0 0 0-1.341zM1.85 6.984a4.991 4.991 0 1 1 4.99 5.087 5.036 5.036 0 0 1-4.99-5.09z">
           </path>
          </svg>
         </span>
        </a>
        <form action="https://ktla.com/" class="search-form site-header__search-form" role="search">
         <span class="screen-reader-text">
          Search
         </span>
         <div class="search-form__fields">
          <input name="s" placeholder="What are you looking for?" type="search"/>
          <input name="submit" type="submit" value="Search"/>
         </div>
        </form>
       </div>
      </div>
     </nav>
    </div>
   </header>

      <section class="article-list article-list--story-grid article-list--story-grid--hero-full" data-module-type="standard layout" id="standard-layout">
       <h2 class="article-list__heading screen-reader-text">
        Headlines
       </h2>
       <div class="article-list__content">
        <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type main-story-link" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="1480923" data-collection="article-list1" data-index="0">

          <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
           <a class="article-list__article-link main-story-link" data-link-label="Rapid vaccine rollout in some states backfired, creating too high a demand" data-link-pinned="false" data-link-position="0" data-link-type="standard-main-link" href="https://ktla.com/news/coronavirus/rapid-vaccine-rollout-in-some-states-backfired-creating-too-high-a-demand/">

           </a>
          </h3>
          <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
           <a class="article-list__article-category-link category-link-0" data-link-label="Coronavirus" data-link-pinned="false" data-link-position="0" data-link-type="standard-category-link" href="https://ktla.com/news/coronavirus/">

          </footer>

          <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
           <a class="article-list__article-link" data-link-label="Victim of suspected street-racing crash in West Hills identified as 57-year-old single mother" data-link-pinned="false" data-link-position="4" data-link-type="standard-content-link" href="https://ktla.com/news/local-news/victim-of-suspected-street-racing-crash-in-west-hills-identified-as-57-year-old-single-mother/">

           </a>
          </h3>
          <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
           <a class="article-list__article-category-link category-link-4" data-link-label="Local news" data-link-pinned="false" data-link-position="4" data-link-type="standard-category-link" href="https://ktla.com/news/local-news/">
            Local news
           </a>
           /
           <time datetime="2021-03-20T23:27:25-07:00">
            15 hours ago

            <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://ktla.com/news/local-news/stop-asian-hate-candlelight-vigil-in-alhambra-honors-victims-of-atlanta-area-spa-shootings-urges-end-to-anti-asian-violence/">

              <div class="image-wrapper square vilynx_enabled" data-vilynx-id="LIN_6457242">
               <img alt="" loading="lazy" sizes="50px" src="https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2021/03/stop-asian-hate.jpg?w=600&amp;h=600&amp;crop=1" srcset="https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2021/03/stop-asian-hate.jpg?w=100&amp;h=100&amp;crop=1 100w, https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2021/03/stop-asian-hate.jpg?w=200&amp;h=200&amp;crop=1 200w, https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2021/03/stop-asian-hate.jpg?w=300&amp;h=300&amp;crop=1 300w, https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2021/03/stop-asian-hate.jpg?w=600&amp;h=600&amp;crop=1 600w"/>
              </div>
              <span aria-hidden="true" class="article-list__article-mediaicon article-list__article-mediaicon--video" tabindex="-1">

                </svg>

               </span>

             </div>
            </a>
           </figure>
          </article>

           <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="1464720" data-collection="article-list3" data-index="2">
            <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list3" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","256px"]'>
             <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://ktla.com/podcasts/friends-with-friends/s5-ep-6-the-one-with-the-yetifriends-with-friends-podcast/">
               S5 Ep.6 The One with the Yeti|Friends with Friends podcast
              </a>
             </h3>
             <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
              <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://ktla.com/podcasts/friends-with-friends/">
               Friends with Friends
              </a>
              /
              <time datetime="2021-03-17T04:02:00-07:00">
               4 days ago
              </time>
             </footer>
            </div>
            <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
             <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://ktla.com/podcasts/friends-with-friends/s5-ep-6-the-one-with-the-yetifriends-with-friends-podcast/">
              <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
               <div class="image-wrapper landscape">
                <img alt="" loading="lazy" sizes="256px" src="https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/05/WATCHPARTY_PODCAST_HD___.jpg?w=1920&amp;h=1080&amp;crop=1" srcset="https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/05/WATCHPARTY_PODCAST_HD___.jpg?w=160&amp;h=90&amp;crop=1 160w, https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/05/WATCHPARTY_PODCAST_HD___.jpg?w=256&amp;h=144&amp;crop=1 256w, https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/05/WATCHPARTY_PODCAST_HD___.jpg?w=320&amp;h=180&amp;crop=1 320w, https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/05/WATCHPARTY_PODCAST_HD___.jpg?w=512&amp;h=288&amp;crop=1 512w, https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/05/WATCHPARTY_PODCAST_HD___.jpg?w=640&amp;h=360&amp;crop=1 640w, https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/05/WATCHPARTY_PODCAST_HD___.jpg?w=876&amp;h=493&amp;crop=1 876w, https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/05/WATCHPARTY_PODCAST_HD___.jpg?w=960&amp;h=540&amp;crop=1 960w, https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/05/WATCHPARTY_PODCAST_HD___.jpg?w=1280&amp;h=720&amp;crop=1 1280w, https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/05/WATCHPARTY_PODCAST_HD___.jpg?w=1752&amp;h=986&amp;crop=1 1752w, https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/05/WATCHPARTY_PODCAST_HD___.jpg?w=1920&amp;h=1080&amp;crop=1 1920w, https://ktla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/05/WATCHPARTY_PODCAST_HD___.jpg?w=1920&amp;h=1080&amp;crop=1 2560w"/>
               </div>
               <span aria-hidden="true" class="article-list__article-mediaicon article-list__article-mediaicon--audio" tabindex="-1">

             </a>
            </figure>
           </article>
           <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="1464718" data-collection="article-list3" data-index="3">
            <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list3" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","256px"]'>
             <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://ktla.com/podcasts/friends-with-friends/s5-ep-5-the-one-with-the-kipsfriends-with-friends-podcast/">

            <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list3" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","256px"]'>
             <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://ktla.com/podcasts/frank-buckley-interviews/swimming-with-sharks-kim-chambers-on-her-17-hour-golden-gate-swim-frank-buckley-interviews/">

              </a>
             </h3>
             <footer class="article-list__article-meta">

            </figure>

           <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="1462120" data-collection="article-list3" data-index="7">
            <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list3" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","256px"]'>
             <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://ktla.com/podcasts/frank-buckley-interviews/legendary-sportscaster-jim-gray-shares-unheard-stories-about-some-of-the-greatest-athletes-of-all-time-frank-buckley-interviews/">

              </a>
             </h3>
             <footer class="article-list__article-meta">

              </a>

          <section class="article-list article-list--story-grid article-list--story-grid--one-col">
           <h2 class="article-list__heading">
            California
           </h2>
           <div class="article-list__content">
            <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="1481023" data-collection="article-list5" data-index="0">
             <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list5" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px"]'>
              <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
               <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://ktla.com/news/local-news/asylum-seekers-at-san-diego-border-wonder-wait-due-to-inconsistent-u-s-immigration-policies/">
                Asylum seekers at San Diego border wonder, wait due to inconsistent immigration policies
               </a>
              </h3>
              <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
               <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://ktla.com/news/local-news/">
                Local news
               </a>
               /
               <time datetime="2021-03-21T12:29:50-07:00">
                2 hours ago
               </time>
              </footer>
             </div>
             <figure class="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://ktla.com/news/local-news/asylum-seekers-at-san-diego-border-wonder-wait-due-to-inconsistent-u-s-immigration-policies/">
               <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
                <div class="image-wrapper landscape">

            <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-slat article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="1480923" data-collection="article-list7" data-index="1">
             <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list7" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px"]'>
              <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
               <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://ktla.com/news/coronavirus/rapid-vaccine-rollout-in-some-states-backfired-creating-too-high-a-demand/">

          <section class="article-list article-list--story-grid article-list--story-grid--one-col">
           <h2 class="article-list__heading">
            5 Live
           </h2>
           <div class="article-list__content">
            <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="1480131" data-collection="article-list9" data-index="0">
             <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list9" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px"]'>
              <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
               <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://ktla.com/5-live/nutritionists-protein-pouch-changes-the-grab-and-go-food-game/">
                Nutritionist’s protein pouch changes the grab-and-go food game
               </a>
              </h3>
              <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
               <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://ktla.com/5-live/">
                5 Live
               </a>
               /
               <time datetime="2021-03-19T18:19:10-07:00">
                2 days ago
               </time>
              </footer>
             </div>
             <figure class="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://ktla.com/5-live/nutritionists-protein-pouch-changes-the-grab-and-go-food-game/">
               <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
                <div class="image-wrapper landscape vilynx_enabled" data-vilynx-id="LIN_6455281">
